name: Consegna
description:
In this game the player will be delivering food from different restaurant in different maps. each stage will have a different map and a timer to finish all the orders within the time limit. Between every level they have obstacles such as a tree blocking the way, a pedestrian walking a cross the road, other car and etc.

Controls

Movement : Users can move up, down, left, right using w a s d or arrow keys.

Objective : Users have to go to the objective “press enter” to pick up the order then deliver the objective to the drop off point in a time limit.

Game Mechanics

Restaurant tile: When the player touch this tile the character will be delivering for that restaurant

Booster: speed the character up for a second

Character: there will be a playable character that the player can move by pressing w a s d or arrow keys.

Obstacles: there will be a random obstacle in every stage that block players way.

Timer: Each stage have different time limit.

Win Condition : Player have to finish delivering all orders from different restaurant within the time limit

Lose Condition : Player didn’t finish all order when the time limit is reached
